title: He Really Said That
description: Audio library of Donald J. Trump quotes, built with responsive design in mind. Solo project.
category: JavaScript, jQuery, HandlebarsJS, HTML5, CSS3, Skeleton.

title: No Spoilers
description: A single page app for TV-watchers to view information about their favorite shows without spoiling the plot. Pulls data from multiple API's. I developed methods on our Mongoose models to control user episode approvals, and user routing.
category: Front-end built with JavaScript, jQuery, HandlebarsJS, HTML5, and CSS3. RESTful Node.js (Express framework) services backed by MongoDB on the back-end.

title: Projects Manager
description: An app to help an administrator track ongoing projects and employees working on those projects, utilizing the Window's localStorage property to act as a simple database.

title: PDX Farm Finder
description: In-progress app that allows users to search for Portland area farms through a variety of search criteria. Utilizes the Google Maps API for better visualization. Solo project.
category: PHP and MySQL database on the back-end. JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 on the front-end.
